Boeber (nke a na-akpọ ) bụ aha Cape Malay maka pudding South Africa
Ọ ghọwo ihe ọṅụṅụ mmiri ara ehi nke ọdịnala Cape Malay, nke e ji vermicelli, sago, shuga mee, ma jiri cardamom, cinnamon, na mmiri rose mee
A na-enye pudding ahụ n'abalị nke iri na ise nke Ramadan iji mee emume n'etiti ibu ọnụ, maka ndị mechara ụbọchị iri na ise mbụ nke ibu ọnụ
A makwara ha dị ka ndị op die berg (n'ụzọ nkịtị 'erute n'elu ugwu').
Na South Africa, ọ bụ Cape Malays mere boeber, ndị nna nna ha si Indonesia, East Africa, na India
Ndị Malaysia na-eri nri yiri nke a a na-akpọ bubur lambuk (porridge pụrụ iche) iji kwụsị ibu ọnụ ha na Ramadan
A na-enye ihe ọṅụṅụ yiri nke a na-akpọ Sawine ma ọ bụ Sewine n'ụlọ Trinidad na Tobago na Eid al-Fitr (ememme na-egosi njedebe nke Ramadan)
N'ụwa niile, enwere ihe ọṅụṅụ yiri ya dịka Asian kheer na sweet congee
Boeber yiri kheer ma ọ bụ payasam, ihe oriri na-esi ísì ụtọ nke sitere na mpaghara India, nke ndị ohu India nwere ike iwebata, ma ọ bụ ndị mbịara mbịara India nke afọ 1860
Na South Africa, nri Afrikaans a maara dị ka melkkos yiri boeber.
Ọtụtụ ndị mmadụ na-eme boeber dị ka usoro nri ezinụlọ si dị, ọtụtụ akwụkwọ nri Cape Malay nwere usoro nri na foto nke nri boeber
Na mgbakwunye, a na-enweta ngwakọta boeber na nnukwu ụlọ ahịa ahọpụtara, kọfị dị n'akụkụ, na ụlọ ahịa ihe na-esi ísì ụtọ na South Africa.
Na-etinye sago n'ime mmiri ruo nkeji iri na ise
Gbanye bọta n'ime ofe miri emi
Tinye vermicelli ma tụba ya na bọta na fork ruo mgbe vermicelli na-acha nchara nchara
Tinye cardamom, sinamọn na sultanas, ma mee ka ọ dị mma
Wụnye mmiri ara ehi ma mee ka ọ sie
Tinye sago na simmer maka minit 30 ma ọ bụ ruo mgbe sago pụtara ìhè, na-agbanye mgbe niile iji gbochie itinye ihe ndị ahụ na saucepan
Tinye mmiri rose, shuga na almọnd, ma gaa n'ihu na-esi nri ruo mgbe agwakọta nke ọma maka minit 10
Na-enye ọkụ
Ọ na-eme 8 ruo 10 servings
Oge nkwadebe: 1 awa.
